description:
Kryptonite made the classic U-lock even safer. A double-deadbolt design and a contoured lock-to-lock bar interface protect the Mini-7 from twisting or 1-cut attacks. These features greatly reduce the chance of your bike falling victim to a crime of opportunity.

  • 12.7mm hardened shackle and double deadbolt protect from leverage and twist attacks
  • Disc-style lock cylinder is pick- and drill-resistant
  • Dust-cover keeps road grit out of your lock
  • Stainless steel keys are coded and can be registered with Kryptonite should you need a replacement
  • Flexframe-U bracket provides mounting options
name: Kryptonite Kryptolok Mini-7 U-Lock
